metadata.label: Asthma - Baseline Scenario
metadata.description:
A scenario where there is no change in the coverage of any intervention.
This baseline scenario is useful when you're interested in varying multiple interventions at the same time.

Low Dose Beclometasone Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Low Dose Beclometasone Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Low Dose Beclometasone Scale-Up Start Ye.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Low Dose Beclometasone Scale-Up Final Ye.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Low Dose Beclometasone Population In Nee.description: The proportion of persons with asthma who require the intervention

Low Dose Beclometasone Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Baseline Coverag.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Scale-Up Final Y.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

High Dose Beclometasone Population In Ne.description: The proportion of persons with asthma who require the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Disability Impac.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention
